update.releaseNotes:
LATEST UPDATES... - BUG FIX: Fixes database installation bug to enable translation/search to work again! - fixed for the image editor screen, including better support for landscape - dictionary updated from the latest dictionary by Geshe Lobsang Monlam - added new camera option for image editing mode
FROM BEFORE... - a big new update to the look and feel! - now using new Google Noto Tibetan font - easy export of definitions to other apps in text or customizeable image! - built-in Tibetan "app store" listing - provides Tibetan word suggestions with Zom Mobile Messenger app (https://zom.im)
